itunes:title: Sunday Special: Battle for the Border with Sheriff Lamb
title: Sunday Special: Battle for the Border with Sheriff Lamb
description:
In this special episode of Human Events Daily, Jack Posobiec is joined by Sheriff Mark Lamb of Pinal County, Arizona to discuss Turning Point USA’s new six-part docuseries, “Border Battle”. In this engaging conversation, Lamb and Poso cover topics ranging from the fentanyl zombies looking for their next fix to the cartel crime bleeding throughout the country. Lamb reports the statistics, proving the Chinese and Cartel’s fentanyl poisoning of Americans is spiraling out of control and crippling the nation under the Biden Administration’s “Open Border Policy”. Join Lamb and Poso in their call to regain America’s moral compass in order to extinguish the disgusting, evil appetite in this country for sex slavery, pedophilia, and drug usage. This is one episode you can’t afford to miss. 



Here’s your Daily dose of Human Events with @JackPosobiec 


Save up to 65% on MyPillow products by going to MyPillow.com/POSO and use code POSO
